amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Eminent domain; powers of board of trustees; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: The Board of Trustees of the Nebraska State Colleges is hereby given power and authority to acquire by condemnation lands necessary for state colleges. The procedure to condemn such property shall be exercised in the manner set forth in Chapter 76, article 7.
